visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly average temperatures for a year. Custom colors should be applied to the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins and background settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature' aligned to the left. The x-axis represents months with styled labels, and the y-axis represents temperature with a title and styled labels. The data series includes monthly average temperatures for a year, with a custom color applied. Additional configurations include chart margins, a light background color, and a disabled legend for a cleaner look.
